name: traitor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is not loyal or stops being loyal to their own country, social class, beliefs, etc.: The leaders of the rebellion were hanged as traitors. The Chinese Communist Party branded (= called) Mr Gorbachev "a traitor to socialism". Synonyms
Judas
backstabber
betrayer (NOT LOYAL)

a person who gives away or sells secrets of his or her country, or someone who is not loyal to particular beliefs or friends: Benedict Arnold was a traitor during the American Revolution. Opponents called the mayor "a traitor to the cause."
